alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Logan (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 02 at 2:21PM CST until January 02 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... North central Logan County in western Arkansas... Western Johnson County in western Arkansas... * Until 300 PM CST. * At 221 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Paris, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Paris... Subiaco... Hartman... Scranton... Ratcliff... Woodland... Hinkle... Hoyt... Spadra... Coal Hill... Caulksville... Morrison Bluff... Catalpa... Roseville... Union City... Oark... Hunt... Wilkins... New Spadra... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
